content: @ElvisPerkins @kathygriffin They're hogs. God put them here for our use, be it for clothing or sustenance. While I respect your right to choose not to eat meat, i just ask you respect my right to make my own choices. That said, on a whim I got an impossible burger at Burger King. I was shocked- it was good

Today I heard on @BBCWorld that the Impossible Burger tastes more like meat because it contains biosynthetic heme. To mimic the bloody taste of actual meat. 

Which is fascinating. Is this truly a vegetarian burger if it contains animal proteins? https://t.co/Af7qqVpDy6
